low-level-link_heading.label: Links from the rest of the levels

font.label: Fonts
font.comment: Looking for google fonts integration? Use the Head links option below. Getting Started Guide

head_link.label: Head links
head_link.comment:
Please note, that protocol name (http) could be removed, to work with secure pages. Example:
<link href='//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Sans+Pro' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'/>

css.label: Css styles
css.comment: You can put css code inside textarea, or create custom.css file in skin folder of active argento theme
